Line11.6D03F: (sigh) Of course. He had a hand in all of this from the beginning, didn’t he?
Line13.6D03F: No, I understand. Where is the stone?
Line15.BAE4: We had to take the risk.
Line17.BAE4: Neyrelle...she didn’t come back to you?
Line21.BAE4: She must have already gone ahead to the desert chapel.
Line25.6D03F: I...I need to bring Donan and seal the gate to Hell behind us. I will...only slow you down.
Line27.BAE4: You can’t do this on your own, my friend. We came together; we leave together, too.
Line3.6D03F: Is she trapped in the stone?
Line5.BAE4: It is done. Lilith is no more.
Line9.BAE4: No. Mephisto is. He helped us reach the Cathedral of Hatred before Lilith did.
VoiceDir11.6D03F: hint of confrontation, but not angry
VoiceDir25.6D03F: Voice breaking a bit, searching for words, as he realizes the task ahead: he has to carry his only friend out of Hell.
VoiceDir3.6D03F: Still recovering emotionally from Donan's death, but he's better than before. More lucid and aware.
